hero.title: AI Social Media Auto-Operation Platform
hero.subtitle:
From topic discovery to content generation, and multi-platform auto-distribution & interaction.
One-stop AI solution making social media operation easier than ever.

hotVideos.title: AI Hot Video Discovery
hotVideos.desc: Real-time monitoring of big data to accurately capture traffic trends, helping you discover viral topics one step ahead.

copywriting.title: AI Copywriting
copywriting.desc: Deep learning of viral copywriting logic, generating catchy titles and scripts in one click, saying goodbye to creative block.

imageGen.title: AI Text-to-Image
imageGen.desc: No professional painting skills required, generate high-quality cover images and illustrations just by entering text.

videoGen.title: AI Text-to-Video
videoGen.desc: One-click text-to-video conversion, automatically matching materials and effects to mass-produce high-quality short videos.

autoPublish.title: Auto Publishing
autoPublish.desc: Supports multi-account matrix management, scheduled automatic publishing of posts or videos, freeing your hands.

autoReply.title: Auto Reply Interaction
autoReply.desc: Intelligently identify comment intent, automatically reply to fan interactions, significantly increasing account activity.
